sentence.Network_en: He didn't want to antagonize her.
Not wishing to antagonize her further, he said no more.
sentence.Network_cn: 他不愿惹她更生气，便不再说话。

sentence.Network_en: Large firms do not wish to antagonize the federal government unduly.
sentence.Network_cn: 大厂商并不想过分地与政府发生顶撞.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent. (in the sense 'struggle against'): from Greek antagōnizesthai, from ant- 'against' + agōnizesthai 'struggle' (from agōn 'contest')

entry.tran: 惹恼；引起…的敌意（或反感）
entry.def: If you antagonize someone, you make them feel angry or hostile towards you.

example.ex: He didn't want to antagonize her.

auth_sentence.content: Traficant, 60, does not want to antagonize his fellow members, said his chief of staff, Charlie Straub.

sentences.en: Don’t antagonize the neighbours by making a noise.
sentences.cn: 别吵吵闹闹,惹邻居讨厌。
